channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Mask Passwords Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Mask Passwords Plugin

item.title: CVE-2019-10370|2024-08-04T22:17:20.508Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mask%20passwords%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Mask Passwords Plugin 2.12.0 and earlier transmits globally configured passwords in plain text as part of the configuration form, potentially resulting in their exposure.
